index.guild_only: I can't execute that command inside DMs!
index.dm_only: I can't execute that command inside guilds! Please send me that command private
index.restricted: Unfortunately, you are not authorised to execute this command!
index.missing_args: You have given the wrong number of arguments
index.error: There was an error trying to execute that command! Ask the holy Ilias for help!
index.not_in_voice: You have to be in a voice channel to use this command!
index.not_same_channel: You have to be in the same channel with the bot to use this command!

help.help: List all commands or give info about a specific command.

intro.0: Here's a list of all commands:
intro.2: to get info on a specific command

dm.success: I've sent you a DM with all my commands!
dm.fail_console: Could not send help DM to
dm.fail_reply: It seems like I can't DM you! Do you have DMs disabled?

reload.invalid_command: There is no command with this name or alias
reload.fail: There was an error while reloading a command

join.help: The bot joins in the voice channel you are currently in
join.not_in_voice: You have to be in a voice channel for this command!

leave.help: The bot leaves the voice channel
leave.bot_not_alone_or_same_channel: Bot has to be alone or with you in a voice channel!

play.help: The bot starts the music playback. You can choose one of the channels 'main, mellow, rock, world-etc' and a playback quality '320k, 128k, 64k, 32k'. Default are main and 128k

resume.not_dispatched: Music playback has not been initiated yet! Write play first!

pause.help: The bot is pausing the music playback
pause.not_dispatched: Music playback has not been initiated yet! Write play first!
